duties_responsibilities.duty: Performing patient care procedures and skills acquired through graduation of an accredited school of nursing.
Assessing, planning, implementing, and evaluating care according to hospital policies, procedures, protocols, and care standards.
Responsible for direct and indirect care of patients through the supervision of select delegated nursing acts and collaborating with physicians and multidisciplinary team members.

education_certification.credential: Graduate of Bachelor of Science in Nursing (BSN). Will consider other nursing degrees on an individual basis. Previous patient care experience (may be as a student in a clinical setting). Current licensure as a Registered Nurse in the state of Wisconsin. Current CPR certification or eligible to complete within 3 months of hire
